mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Schedule (scheduleNo, mid, scheduleTitle, startDate, endDate, scheduleContent) VALUES (scheduleNo_seq.NEXTVAL, #{mid}, #{scheduletitle}, TO_DATE(#{startdate},'yyyy-MM-dd'), TO_DATE(#{enddate},'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{schedulecontent})
